summary: Huntsville is Alabama's biggest city and was once the state capital for a short time. It started as a small town in 1805 and grew a lot after World War II. The city is known for its space research and important government centers, like NASA's Marshall Space Flight Center. Huntsville is also famous for its historic places and had about 220,000 people living there in 2022. It's the second largest city in Alabama after Birmingham.
title: Huntsville, Alabama
